News

28 July 2021
New PRD publication by Reggie on gravitational wave signatures from dark sector interactions (See paper).

7 July 2021
New JMP publication by Reggie and Ian on stealth black hole perturbations (See paper).

23 June 2021
New CQG publication by Joshua and Ian on the nonlinear dynamics of charged particles (See paper).

17 June 2021
Karlo successfully defends his MS thesis on geometric thermodynamics! Congratulations Master De Leon!

16 June 2021
Joshua successfully defends his MS thesis on anisotropic stellar structure! Congratulations Master Bautista!

16 June 2021
Reggie is on a roll! Check out his preprints on gravitational waves in the interacting dark sector here, and his forays into data-driven cosmology here and here.

15 June 2021
Gab successfully defends his MS thesis on swimming in cuved surfaces! Congratulations Master Alkuino!

15 June 2021
CJ and Jaythan successfully defend their BS theses on delayed cosmology and time-travel traversability, respectively. Job well done guys!

23 March 2021
New JCAP paper by Reggie on cosmological dynamics in self-tuning kinetic gravity braiding (See paper).

1 December 2020
Preprint by Joshua and Ian on chaotic dynamics in weakly magnetized black holes (See paper).

23 October 2020
C.J. Palpal-latoc wins Best Scientific Presentation for Theoretical and Mathematical Physics in the 38th SPP Physics Conference. Congratulations CJ!

12 August 2020
Rappler features work by resident artist Marc Perez.

7 August 2020
Mark successfully defends his MS thesis! Congratulations Master Ugalino!

5 August 2020
Jhon successfully defends his MS thesis! Congratulations Master Procurato!

26 July 2020
Preprint by Reggie and Ian on gravitational perturbations of stealth black holes in kinetic gravity braiding (See paper).

24 June 2020
C.J. Palpal-latoc is one of the few selected to the highly competitive MPKNN Science Communication Workshop. Congratulations CJ!

7 June 2020
ABS-CBN spotlight on Reggie.

6 June 2020
Special feature on Reggie by Davao Today .

22 May 2020
Reggie successfully defends his PhD! Congratulations Dr. Bernardo!

13 March 2020
Preprint by Sean and Ian on Bernstein spectral methods for quasinormal modes (See paper).

16 January 2020
New PRD publication by Reggie, John and Ian on stealth black holes (See paper).

30 November 2019
NIP Gravity members head to Taipei to attend APTCP Workshop on Gravitational Wave Cosmology.

11 July 2019
Ian is 2019 NAST Outstanding Young Scientist for Physics (UP announcement).

14 June 2019
Karlo de Leon (BS Physics, Summa Cum Laude) is awarded the 2019 Leticia Shahani Award for Best Physics Thesis and the 2019 Joker Arroyo Award for Outstanding BS Physics Graduate. Congratulations, Karlo!
